# <a name="keyboard-shortcuts-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="43dc1-102">Outlook.com 中的鍵盤快速鍵</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43dc1-102">Keyboard shortcuts in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43dc1-103">在 Outlook.com 中，您可以使用與您用來使用的電子郵件服務（例如 Gmail、Yahoo Mail 或 Outlook.com）相同的鍵盤快速鍵。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43dc1-103">In Outlook.com you can use the same keyboard shortcuts as the email service you're used to working with, such as Gmail, Yahoo Mail, or Outlook.com.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43dc1-104">移至 [協助工具設定](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080840) (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43dc1-104">Go to [Accessibility settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080840) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="43dc1-105">**設定**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43dc1-105">**Settings**</span></span> 
 > <span data-ttu-id="43dc1-106">**流覽所有 Outlook 設定**  > **一般**  > **協助工具**) ，並選擇您想要使用的鍵盤快速鍵。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43dc1-106">**View all Outlook settings** > **General** > **Accessibility**) and choose which keyboard shortcuts you'd like use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="43dc1-107">若要查看完整的鍵盤快速鍵清單，請參閱 [Outlook.com 鍵盤快速鍵](https://support.office.com/article/708d907e-4398-4fc6-9a9a-4fc72bccec16?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="43dc1-107">To see the full list of keyboard shortcuts, see [Outlook.com keyboard shortcuts](https://support.office.com/article/708d907e-4398-4fc6-9a9a-4fc72bccec16?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
